articles.description: Charlotte Dujardin, Britain's joint-most decorated female Olympian, has been provisionally suspended for six months by the FEI.
articles.title: Charlotte Dujardin: British dressage star provisionally suspended for six months

articles.description: Uefa opens "disciplinary proceedings" against Spain captain Alvaro Morata and team-mate Rodri after they chanted "Gibraltar is Spanish" during their Euro 2024 victory celebrations.
articles.title: Uefa charges Alvaro Morata & Rodri after 'Gibraltar is Spanish' chant during Euro 2024 celebrations

articles.description: Paige Scholfield hits 71 as Oval Invincibles cruise to a 46-run win over Birmingham Phoenix in the opening match of The Hundred women's competition.
articles.title: The Hundred 2024: Oval Invincibles thrash Birmingham Phoenix as Paige Scholfield hits 71 in opening match

articles.description: Two-time gold medallist Andy Murray will retire after the Olympics in Paris.
articles.title: Andy Murray to retire from tennis after 2024 Paris Olympics

articles.description: The top European leagues and players' union Fifpro will launch legal action against world governing body Fifa over its "abuse of dominance".
articles.title: Fifa: European leagues & Fifpro take legal action over 'abuse of dominance'

articles.description: In the space of a month in 2012, Andy Murray went from tears in the rain to gold in the sunshine, winning hearts and medals on Centre Court.
articles.title: Andy Murray, Wimbledon & the Olympics - four weeks that changed it all

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says influential midfielder Kevin de Bruyne will stay at the club.
articles.title: Man City: Pep Guardiola says Kevin de Bruyne will not leave

articles.description: Paris 2024 promises to halve the carbon footprint of London 2012 and Rio 2016. How will it happen and what challenges must be tackled?
articles.title: Paris 2024: Will it be most sustainable Olympic Games ever?

articles.description: It's the best time of the year for football kit enthusiasts as clubs get decked out ready for the new season - but which is your favourite?
articles.title: New football kits 2024-25: rate your favourite

articles.description: Ghanaian authorities are investigating after several individuals claiming to be para-athletes reportedly absconded during a trip to Norway.
articles.title: Ghana investigating para-athletic 'imposters' in Norway
